title: 2021–22 Zambia Super League
text:
The 2021–22 Zambia Super League is the 61st season of the <a href="Zambia%20Super%20League">Zambia Super League</a>, the top-tier <a href="Association%20football">football</a> league in <a href="Zambia">Zambia</a>. The league is expected to kick off on 11 September. <a href="ZESCO%20United%20F.C.">ZESCO United</a> are the defending champions, having won their ninth Super League title during the <a href="2020%E2%80%9321%20Zambia%20Super%20League">previous season</a>.
Teams.
The league consists of 18 teams, including 15 teams from the 2020-21 Zambian Premier League and promoted teams Kafue Celtic of Lusaka and <a href="Chambishi%20F.C.">Chambishi F.C.</a>, who appear in the top flight after an 11-year absence.
Standings.
